page.title: 02SILVERBURN, near Penicuik
page.content: {Silverburn}is two and a half miles from{Penicuik}.There are{forty seven people living in Silverburn.There are fourteen children.The people in Silverburn have interesting jobs.There is a{physicist}who is English ,a {forester,architect,harp maker,joiner, {coach builder},and even a{business {man}.Many people have cars ,and vans.People are very friendly and have been living there for many years.One person had lived in Silverburn for thirty five years ,and was even born in Silverburn.There was even a{rural {club}for women ,a{few litter bins {,telephone boxes}and{letter boxes.}The fields were very nice and were filled with{cows and sheep}.Houses had small windows,and were just under two hundered years old.
